programme.title: McEnroe and Gorbachev
programme.short_synopsis: John McEnroe's dismissal from the 1990 Australian Open, and Gorbachev's plans for peace.
programme.medium_synopsis: The politeness of American crowds, the dismissal of John McEnroe from the Australian Open, and Gorbachev's plan to make a profit from peace, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.
